article_title: Israel-Gaza conflict: How we got here.
sentence: As  a  reminder,  here's  a  brief  look  at  how  the  conflict  has  developed  in  recent  months  up  until  this  point:  On  7  October,  Hamas  launched  an  attack  on  Israel  ,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  more  than  250  others  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: Israel-Gaza conflict: How we got here.
sentence: More  than  34,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed,  and  tens  of  thousands  injured  by  Israeli  strikes  since  the  start  of  the  war,  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says.
